sn56.16:4.1: “Dhāretha no tumhe, bhikkhave, mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti?
sn56.16:4.2: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn56.16:4.3: “ahaṃ kho, bhante, dhāremi bhagavatā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti.
sn56.16:5.1: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, dhāresi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti?
sn56.16:5.2: “Dukkhaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ dhāremi.
sn56.16:5.3: Yo hi koci, bhante, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃ vadeyya:
sn56.16:5.4: ‘netaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yaṃ samaṇena gotamena desitaṃ.
sn56.16:5.5: Ahametaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paccakkhāya aññaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti—
sn56.16:5.8: dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā catutthaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ dhāremi.
sn56.16:5.9: Yo hi koci, bhante, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃ vadeyya:
sn56.16:5.10: ‘netaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā catutthaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yaṃ samaṇena gotamena desitaṃ.
sn56.16:5.11: Ahametaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ catutthaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paccakkhāya aññaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ catutthaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti—
sn56.16:5.13: Evaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, dhāremi bhagavatā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti.
sn56.16:6.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, dhāresi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānīti.
sn56.16:6.3: Dukkhaṃ kho, bhikkhu, mayā paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ, tathā naṃ dhārehi.
sn56.16:6.4: Yo hi koci, bhikkhu, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃ vadeyya:
sn56.16:6.5: ‘netaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yaṃ samaṇena gotamena desitaṃ.
sn56.16:6.6: Ahametaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paccakkhāya aññaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti—
sn56.16:6.10: dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā kho, bhikkhu, mayā catutthaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ, tathā naṃ dhārehi.
sn56.16:6.11: Yo hi koci, bhikkhu, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃ vadeyya:
sn56.16:6.12: ‘netaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā catutthaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yaṃ samaṇena gotamena desitaṃ.
sn56.16:6.13: Ahametaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ catutthaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paccakkhāya aññaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ catutthaṃ ariyasaccaṃ paññapessāmī’ti—
sn56.16:6.15: Evaṃ kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, dhārehi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānīti.
